text: John William Carter (born July 3, 1947) is an American businessman and politician. He unsuccessfully ran for the United States Senate in Nevada in 2006. Carter was born at Naval Hospital Portsmouth in Portsmouth, Virginia, He is the eldest child of former President Jimmy Carter and First Lady Rosalynn Carter. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Jimmy Carter Category:Businesspeople from Virginia Category:Politicians from Virginia Category:Businesspeople from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Politicians from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:People from Plains, Georgia Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Emory University alumni
title: Jack Carter (politician)
